Articles.Content: I prefer KLF to DMP, as it doesn't interrupt usage of mods and normal gameplay.
Either way, I really hope this doesn't end up dying again.
Hopefully someone will fix this! But wait, has anyone tried just using the latest release in 1.0 yet? Does that work?
even if it does I'm not aware of any servers that are online.

I just got my Blade server restored to full function. I have 2 more websites to bring online. And had a bug to squash in my Life Support mod. I will be bringing the KLF server back online no later than 7-14-2015. Thank you for your patience.

I can distribute the server code files to who ever wants them but you have to be able to compile them yourself as I hard coded the directory structure for my blade and compiled mine as a service instead of a console app which will only run on a windows 2008 server.

Edited July 7, 2015 by Stavell

Version 9.2 Released updated links in main post.

KLF Server is back online at ksp.gaterunner.com and status page at ksp.gaterunner.com:8080 and Screenshot galley are all back operational.

Version 9.2 Released updated links in main post.

KLF Server is back online at ksp.gaterunner.com and status page at ksp.gaterunner.com:8080 and Screenshot galley are all back operational.

Wooo! Thanks for taking the time and updating this amazing mod!
I remember you said that a slow-scan video stream was one of the planned features. Has that been implemented now?
Not yet
We really need people who use this to invite others. I'm sure there are plenty of people on the forums who would like to use KLF, but just don't know it exists.
Is there anyone still here?

Server Source code has been added to GitHub repository.

Working on Adding customized chat window sizing to settings menu and saving KLF settings on a per save game basis.
Yes! KLF is back from almost-death again. I think this is the... 4th time? 5th? Over the last couple of months I've realized that KSP just isn't fun anymore without this mod.

I get this when trying to connect:

System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not defined to an instance of an object.

in System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.get_Connected()

in Client.connectToServer(ClientSettings settings)

in ConsoleClient.connectionLoop(ClientSettings settings)

in ConsoleClient.connect(ClientSettings settings)

Make sure you don't have port 2075 blocked in your firewall.

That reminds me I need to handle that exception better. Added to bug list
I think I'll try make use of KLF this time, instead of vanishing as soon as it was fixed last time.

The default viewer hotkey defaults to F10, which conflicts with the button that toggles the temp gauge overlay. It's not really impacting to gameplay, but it's kinda annoying. I suggest changing it to something like F6. I would change it for myself, but it seems that it's impossible to remap the hotkeys for the viewer and chat.

Edited July 23, 2015 by mythbusters844
What time are people usually on to play this? I always seem to miss the time people are on.

Thanks I added to the list, to add ability to reassign key - or should I say fix the feature that is there but not working.

The default viewer hotkey defaults to F10, which conflicts with the button that toggles the temp gauge overlay. It's not really impacting to gameplay, but it's just annoying. I suggest changing it to something like F6. I would change for myself it, but it seems that it's impossible to remap the hotkeys for the viewer and chat.
Edited July 23, 2015 by Stavell

Version 0.9.3 Released.

Fixed Chat and Viewer keys so they can be rebinded under options.

Hello!

Just a question about the screenshots. In my settings.cfg i have SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE set to 3, meaning that when i take a screenshot it multiplies the image resolution. So when i take a screenshot with KLF will it multiply the image resolution and send it through the server? I really don't want to load the servers too much.

Just a little thing that may be useful to add is to add a chart on player activity on a certain server. So that people will know what the peak hours are.

By the way, if you think KLF is dead but you want it alive. Don't go away and stay on the server. By leaving you are just contributing to its death. This is how servers are built up and communities are made.

Hello!

Just a question about the screenshots. In my settings.cfg i have SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE set to 3, meaning that when i take a screenshot it multiplies the image resolution. So when i take a screenshot with KLF will it multiply the image resolution and send it through the server? I really don't want to load the servers too much.

Just a little thing that may be useful to add is to add a chart on player activity on a certain server. So that people will know what the peak hours are.

By the way, if you think KLF is dead but you want it alive. Don't go away and stay on the server. By leaving you are just contributing to its death. This is how servers are built up and communities are made.

that is in the KSP Settings file and is for the KSP screenshot feature not the Livefeed one.

Version 0.9.3 Released.

Fixed Chat and Viewer keys so they can be rebinded under options.

Dude, you're amazing enough for updating KLF, but for fixing an issue that fast you're beyond brilliant.
Woot!

The server seems to have been overloaded today, and I keep getting random disconnects .

Edited August 24, 2015 by mythbusters844
